definition: to be afraid/to fear/to dread/to be unable to endure/perhaps

sentences.english: I am shy and find social situations stressful.
sentences.chinese: 我很怕羞，覺得社會場合有壓力。

sentences.english: He is so shy that he always shuns all kinds of public activities.
sentences.chinese: 他是個怕羞的人，總是避開一切引人注目的活動。

sentences.english: Poverty is no shame, laziness is.
sentences.chinese: 貧窮不怕羞，疏懶才光榮。

sentences.english: She was a shy, retiring girl.
sentences.chinese: 你真是個不怕羞的淘氣妞兒。

sentences.english: The shy little boy kept himself back from meeting us.
sentences.chinese: 怕羞的小男孩退縮着不肯上前來見我們。

sentences.english: As a shy 14-year-old, I avoided social gatherings.
sentences.chinese: 我14歲時很怕羞，逃避參加社交聚會。

sentences.english: Alice is very shy, try to bring her out.
sentences.chinese: 愛麗絲很怕羞，要設法鼓勵她說話。

sentences.english: Helen is a very shy girl and does not make friends easily.
sentences.chinese: 海倫是一個很怕羞的女孩子，因而不容易交到朋友。

sentences.english: Never have a girl make me so crazy !
sentences.chinese: 還沒有看到呆呆的態度哦，小女孩怕羞啊？

sentences.english: In those days he was very  timid and shy.
sentences.chinese: 那時，他非常膽小，也很怕羞。

sentences.english: He's shy, so he seldom talks to strangers.
sentences.chinese: 因爲他很怕羞，所以他很少和陌生人說話。

sentences.english: The bashful child felt uncomfortable with strangers.
sentences.chinese: 那孩子怕羞，在陌生人面前感到很不自在。

sentences.english: The shy child clung to her mother .
sentences.chinese: 這個怕羞的女孩緊貼着媽媽。

sentences.english: The child was shy and hid behind his mother.
sentences.chinese: 這個小孩很怕羞，躲在他媽媽後面。

sentences.english: She is very shy. She doesn't like to show her face.
sentences.chinese: 她非常怕羞，她不喜歡拋頭露面。

definition: fear of strangers/to be afraid of strangers (of small children)
affecting shyness or embarrassment/coy/mincing (walk, manner of speech)/mannered
affecting shyness or embarrassment/coy/mincing (walk, manner of speech)/mannered
